title: Frutiger Font
content:
I wanted to use Frutiger on my company's business cards but I don't like the fonts numbers. Can anyone recommend a font very similar to Frutiger.   
   
bella
author: neuroticlilone

comments.content:
[Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019142535/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/F/MYRP/F_MYRP-10005000.jhtml) is very similar to Frutiger in many respects.   
   
-- K.

Fedra sans de Peter Bilak   
   
Arrival de Keith Chi-hang Tam
